name: Redacted
intro: Empowering on-chain liquidity, governance, and cash flow for DeFi protocols
introduce: The Redacted ecosystem is a product suite of smart contracts empowering on-chain liquidity, governance, and cash flow for DeFi protocols. Hidden Hand by Redacted is a marketplace for governance incentives, commonly referred to as "bribes." Protocols can leverage Hidden Hand to enable more efficient governance processes and to engage their voters. Through Hidden Hand users can earn extra yield on their favorite governance tokens via bribes.
